sentences.en: ...the winner of the best supporting actress award.
A supporting network of aircraft cable can be used if necessary.
sentences.cn: 必要对,可以使用飞机缆索的支承网.

sentences.en: Britain looks set to send a major force of over 100 tanks and supporting equipment.
sentences.cn: 看来，英国已下决心要派遣一支配备有百余坦克和支援装备的主力部队。

sentences.en: Hamstrings are supporting muscles at the back of the thigh.
sentences.cn: 腿筋是位于大腿后侧起支撑作用的肌肉。

sentences.en: Hats off to them for supporting the homeless.
sentences.cn: 向他们帮扶无家可归者的善举致敬！

sentences.en: He had thrust his chest out, supporting his shoulders against the mantel.
sentences.cn: 他挺起胸脯, 肩膊抵着壁炉架.

sentences.en: In the engine, oil is supplied to crankshaft and camshaft journals rotating in their supporting bearings.
sentences.cn: 在发动机里, 机油被供应到旋转在其支承轴内的曲轴和凸轮轴轴颈上.

sentences.en: Most of the cash went on supporting his opulent lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 大部分现金都花在了维系他挥金如土的生活方式上。

sentences.en: She won an Oscar nomination for best supporting actress.
sentences.cn: 她获得奥斯卡奖最佳女配角的提名.

sentences.en: The income from visitors makes the museum self-supporting.
sentences.cn: 参观者带来的收入使得这个博物馆能够独立运营。

sentences.en: The movie featured Robert Lindsay in a supporting role .
sentences.cn: 罗伯特∙林赛在这部影片中担任配角。

sentences.en: The other two men stood one on each side supporting him.
sentences.cn: 还有两个人分别站在他的两旁扶持着他.

sentences.en: The supporting case is the outer enclosure of the gyro component.
sentences.cn: 支承壳体是陀螺组件的外壳.

sentences.en: The third cut is made close to the supporting limb to remove the stub.
sentences.cn: 第三锯贴近大枝,去掉短桩.

sentences.en: They say he's certain to get a nomination for best supporting actor.
sentences.cn: 他们说他肯定能获得最佳男配角奖的提名。

words.tran_cn: 可支持的；可援助的；可忍耐的
支持，维持；支援，供养；支持者，支撑物
支持，支撑，支援；扶持，帮助；赡养，供养
支持的；辅助性的；次要的

phrases.tran_cn: 原始单据的证明文件；单据；证件
辅助文档（不译证明文件）
配套设施；辅助设备，辅助设施
支承滚柱；支撑轴；随动轮

trans.tran_en: In a movie or play, a supporting actor or actress is one who has an important part, but not the most important part.

trans.tran_cn: 支持( support的现在分词 )，帮助，支撑，维持
